title: Enchanting Emerald & Polki Diamond Jhumkaalu - Divine Elegance
materials: Simulated Pearl. Crafted with high-quality materials and Hyderabadi Polish for a long-lasting luster.
features: Classic South Indian Jhumka design featuring intricate Polki diamond detailing. The crescent shape connects to a bell-shaped Jhumka bottom, adorned with a pearl drop. The top of the Jhumka features a floral design and a bezel-set Emerald as the central stone. Features an antique finish that highlights the detailed craftsmanship.
colors: Pearl White (pearl). A traditional South Indian color palette symbolizing prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and even adds a touch of traditional elegance to modern celebrations.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship combined with traditional South Indian design makes this Jhumka a timeless treasure. The combination of Polki diamonds, emeralds, and simulated pearl exudes luxury and sophistication. A perfect heirloom piece to be passed down through generations. These stunning earrings are also incredibly versatile, transitioning easily from traditional South Indian attire (like a Kanjeevaram saree) to more modern Indo-western outfits.
